data.oai_dc:dc: Data includes both infected and non-infected hosts. Note that, except for the analysis of susceptibility, only infected individuals were included in the analyses. These data are a subset of a larger dataset published previously in Vale PF, Wilson AJ, Best A, Boots M, Little TJ. (2011) Epidemiological, evolutionary, and coevolutionary implications of context-dependent parasitism. The American Naturalist 177:510-521.
